original_text:
Their children shall be as they were of old,
    and their congregation shall be established before me,
    and I will punish all who oppress them.
korean_text: 그의 자손은 예전과 같겠고 그 회중은 내 앞에 굳게 설 것이며 그를 압박하는 모든 사람은 내가 다 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: Their children shall be as they were of old
and their congregation shall be established before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 회중은 내 앞에 굳게 세우리라

sentences.original_text: and I will punish all who oppress them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 억압하는 모든 자를 벌하리라
